I downloaded it but nothing new is in it.

I went in the gamedata and nothing new is there, the only addition is timewarp in KSC.

Yeah, same here, my career mode is now acting as a sandbox mode, so everything is unlocked and the R&D facility is closed. Reverse is happening to a friend.

Hi, Nibroc. We've now heard a few instances of this. Please sit tight. It's being looked into.

I downloaded it but nothing new is in it.

I went in the gamedata and nothing new is there, the only addition is timewarp in KSC.

We'll need a bit more to go on really, but the place to ask for support is the Support & Bugs forum, not this thread. Make sure to include a KSP.log file when you post there.

Thanks. My name is showing (CAREER) after the title and Mode = 1, which are the same as the new test Career I started. So not sure what is going on.

First load after removing the mods showed some errors with ships that had KEB and Protractor installed, and those ships got removed. Next time I loaded I was able to get into the R&D lab, but everything locked and science reset to zero. So I guess I might as well start a new save.

Looks like it was the mods that messed things up on first load.

Its DOWNLOADING!

Also, how is modding compatibility?

My god! The game now has decals... you can add your logo to parts!!!

Thanks squad

how do you use it? im still downloading it....

Hi, Nibroc. We've now heard a few instances of this. Please sit tight. It's being looked into.

lol its not a prank, hang on I'll get a screenshot up.

Edited April 1, 2014 by Mulbin

Holy hell, the fps improvement is massive! My ~600Ton/470-Part Ship just went from 6/8fps to 16. Turns quite a bit slower, but greatly improved stability. Nothing like the earlier physics overkill by the construction consisting of three ships being connected each by 4x2.5 ports. Good thing that ship was only the smaller prototyp for a 3.5m Vertical Ship/Horizontal Lander-Thingy

Also the new time-skip/orbit calculation/maneuver node-functionality is incredible useful. Awesome update! And i didnt even tried the new parts, not to mention asteroids...

Edited April 1, 2014 by Temeter

*squeels like a little girl in a candy shop* Now I can KSP!

I can haz asteroids?
Flag decals on parts!!!! woooooooot!!!!

spacker

My KSP skills aren't good enough to try asteroid hunting either.

Edited April 1, 2014 by Javster
Best release date EVER!
Logged into my save today and most of my research is gone and i still have my saved ship but cant open i because i dont have the parts unlocked for it?
Please report any issues in the Support Forum. That's where you can get help, not here.

Ok, I know Rowsdower said to post followups in the Support & Bugs section, but I wanted to post this note here incase anyone else is having a similar issue... If you try to upgrade your 0.23 career save to 0.23.5 and notice that the VAB seems to be closed and you can't find any asteroids at the tracking station, quit the game and relaunch it. That seemed to fix it for me, I guess the persistent save didn't get updated properly on launch.

Additionally if you head into the R&D labs and all of your tech advancements are gone after relaunching, hopefully you backed up your save as you can just restore this by copy/pasting the 'ResearchAndDevelopment' section under 'Scenario' from your backed up persistent.sfs to your new persistent.sfs.
is all the new stuff near the end of the tech tree?
Whoever finds the potato, please post pics.
It works! It wasn't a joke!

is all the new stuff near the end of the tech tree?
Since the new parts are mostly larger and/or more advanced devices, they do tend to appear higher in the tree.
